as="points"> <mxPoint x="510" y="230" /> <mxPoint x="510" y="97" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Z-jALrwnLW20pHLmdFVG-5" value="执行硬件自检、BOIS程序启动" </mxCell> <mxCell id="Z-jALrwnLW20pHLmdFVG-10" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;endArrow=block;endFill=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;curved=1;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="Z-jALrwnLW20pHLmdFVG-7" target="Z-jALrwnLW20pHLmdFVG-23" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Z-jALrwnLW20pHLmdFVG-7" value="找到引导设备中MBR执行GRUB引导程序" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=12;glass=0;strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="310" y="290" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Z-jALrwnLW20pHLmdFVG-12" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;endArrow=block;endFill=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="Z-jALrwnLW20pHLmdFVG-9" target="Z-jALrwnLW20pHLmdFVG-11" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BNlC6JwlxGxCdmInczQ0-1" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="Z-jALrwnLW20pHLmdFVG-9" target="BNlC6JwlxGxCdmInczQ0-0"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Z-jALrwnLW20pHLmdFVG-9" value="GRUB加载加载启动Linux Kernel内核" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=12;glass=0;strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="310" y="370" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BNlC6JwlxGxCdmInczQ0-3" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="Z-jALrwnLW20pHLmdFVG-11" target="BNlC6JwlxGxCdmInczQ0-2"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Z-jALrwnLW20pHLmdFVG-11" value="内核执行加载硬件设备、加载文件系统" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=12;glass=0;strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="310" y="450" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Z-jALrwnLW20pHLmdFVG-17" value="<font style="font-size: 12px;">初始化硬件设备、包括CPU、内存、硬盘等，<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85); font-family: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;SF Pro SC&quot;, &quot;SF Pro Display&quot;, &quot;SF Pro Icons&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><font style="">完成自检后，BIOS 会根据用户设置的启动顺序（通常可在 BIOS 设置中调整）寻找可引导的设备，如硬盘、U 盘等。</font></span></font>" style="shape=document;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;align=left;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="580" y="50" width="240" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Z-jALrwnLW20pHLmdFVG-19" value="<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85); font-family: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;SF Pro SC&quot;, &quot;SF Pro Display&quot;, &quot;SF Pro Icons&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><font>GRUB（GRand Unified Bootloader）即 “伟大的统一引导加载程序”，是一个广泛应用于 Linux 系统的多操作系统启动引导程序，主要提供了一个启动菜单，为用户提供启动选项，允许用户选择要启动的操作系统。</font></span>" style="shape=document;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;align=left;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-10" y="110" width="230" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Z-jALrwnLW20pHLmdFVG-22" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.574;entryY=0.8;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;curved=1;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="Z-jALrwnLW20pHLmdFVG-7" target="Z-jALrwnLW20pHLmdFVG-19" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Z-jALrwnLW20pHLmdFVG-23" value="<font><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85); font-family: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;SF Pro SC&quot;, &quot;SF Pro Display&quot;, &quot;SF Pro Icons&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">MBR</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85); font-family: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;SF Pro SC&quot;, &quot;SF Pro Display&quot;, &quot;SF Pro Icons&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">（Master Boot Record）</span></font><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85); font-family: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;SF Pro SC&quot;, &quot;SF Pro Display&quot;, &quot;SF Pro Icons&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><font>设备主引导记录，</font></span><font><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85); font-family: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;SF Pro SC&quot;, &quot;SF Pro Display&quot;, &quot;SF Pro Icons&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">当 BIOS 或 UEFI 找到可引导设备后，</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85); font-family: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;SF Pro SC&quot;, &quot;SF Pro Display&quot;, &quot;SF Pro Icons&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">会加载位于该设备主引导记录。</span></font>" style="shape=document;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;align=left;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="580" y="270" width="240" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BNlC6JwlxGxCdmInczQ0-0" value="GRUB加载linux内核，将控制权交给内核。内核负责加载驱动以及设备，跟文件系统等。" style="shape=document;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;align=left;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="-10" y="350" width="220" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BNlC6JwlxGxCdmInczQ0-5" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="BNlC6JwlxGxCdmInczQ0-2" target="BNlC6JwlxGxCdmInczQ0-4"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BNlC6JwlxGxCdmInczQ0-2" value="内核启动完成后，执行1号进程init/systemd" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=12;glass=0;strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;align=center;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="310" y="545" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BNlC6JwlxGxCdmInczQ0-4" value="1号进程根据配置文件中的顺序，启动系统用户服务和守护进程" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=12;glass=0;strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;align=center;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="310" y="630" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.div: 执行硬件自检、BOIS程序启动

switch.text: 执行硬件自检、BOIS程序启动

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 260px; margin-left: 321px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 找到引导设备中MBR执行GRUB引导程序

switch.text: 找到引导设备中MBR执行GRUB引导程序

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 340px; margin-left: 321px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: GRUB加载加载启动Linux Kernel内核

switch.text: GRUB加载加载启动Linux Kernel内核

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 420px; margin-left: 321px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 内核执行加载硬件设备、加载文件系统

switch.text: 内核执行加载硬件设备、加载文件系统

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 39px; margin-left: 592px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font: 初始化硬件设备、包括CPU、内存、硬盘等，完成自检后，BIOS 会根据用户设置的启动顺序（通常可在 BIOS 设置中调整）寻找可引导的设备，如硬盘、U 盘等。

switch.text: 初始化硬件设备、包括CPU、内存、硬盘等，完成自检后，BIOS 会根据用户设置的启动顺序（通常可在 BIOS 设置中调整）寻找可引导的设备，如硬盘、U 盘等。

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 228px; height: 1px; padding-top: 102px; margin-left: 2px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

span.style: color: light-dark(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85), rgb(237, 237, 237)); font-family: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", "SF Pro SC", "SF Pro Display", "SF Pro Icons", "PingFang SC", "Hiragino Sans GB", "Microsoft YaHei", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18));
span.font: GRUB（GRand Unified Bootloader）即 “伟大的统一引导加载程序”，是一个广泛应用于 Linux 系统的多操作系统启动引导程序，主要提供了一个启动菜单，为用户提供启动选项，允许用户选择要启动的操作系统。

switch.text: GRUB（GRand Unified Bootloader）即 “伟大的统一引导加载程序”，是一个广泛应用于 Linux 系统的多操作系统启动引导程序，主要提供了一个启动菜单，为用户提供启动选项，允许用户选择要启动的操作系统。

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 248px; margin-left: 592px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

span.style: color: light-dark(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85), rgb(237, 237, 237)); font-family: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", "SF Pro SC", "SF Pro Display", "SF Pro Icons", "PingFang SC", "Hiragino Sans GB", "Microsoft YaHei", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18));

color: light-dark(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85), rgb(237, 237, 237)); font-family: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", "SF Pro SC", "SF Pro Display", "SF Pro Icons", "PingFang SC", "Hiragino Sans GB", "Microsoft YaHei", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18));

color: light-dark(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85), rgb(237, 237, 237)); font-family: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", "SF Pro SC", "SF Pro Display", "SF Pro Icons", "PingFang SC", "Hiragino Sans GB", "Microsoft YaHei", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18));

color: light-dark(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85), rgb(237, 237, 237)); font-family: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", "SF Pro SC", "SF Pro Display", "SF Pro Icons", "PingFang SC", "Hiragino Sans GB", "Microsoft YaHei", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18));

font.span: 当 BIOS 或 UEFI 找到可引导设备后，

span.style: color: light-dark(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85), rgb(237, 237, 237)); font-family: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", "SF Pro SC", "SF Pro Display", "SF Pro Icons", "PingFang SC", "Hiragino Sans GB", "Microsoft YaHei", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18));

font.span: 会加载位于该设备主引导记录。

switch.text: MBR（Master Boot Record）设备主引导记录，当 BIOS 或 UEFI 找到可引导设备后，会加载位于该设备主引导记录。

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 328px; margin-left: 2px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: GRUB加载linux内核，将控制权交给内核。内核负责加载驱动以及设备，跟文件系统等。

switch.text: GRUB加载linux内核，将控制权交给内核。内核负责加载驱动以及设备，跟文件系统等。

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 515px; margin-left: 321px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 内核启动完成后，执行1号进程init/systemd

switch.text: 内核启动完成后，执行1号进程init/systemd

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 600px; margin-left: 321px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 1号进程根据配置文件中的顺序，启动系统用户服务和守护进程

switch.text: 1号进程根据配置文件中的顺序，启动系统用户服务和守护进程
